column5: Located near Tx Hill Country Neighborhoods and close to Austin, the Farm Cottage is part of a larger cottage that has been divided into two. The space has its own entrance with deck, living room with sleeper sofa, 2 baths, a private room with queen size bed and a small bed room w/single bed. You will have your own private space and private entrance. The 4 + acres is shared by many two legged and 4 legged creatures, in addition to myself, my husband, my father and my two young adult daughters.
column8: Austin Tx Hill Country Farm Cottage
